model.node

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.node.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Building, Canteen

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    A point representing a location in (x,y) coordinate space on Earth position, specified in double precision.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(double x, double y)
      Constructs and initializes a node at the (x,y) location.
      Node(double x, double y, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a node at the (x,y) location with its ID.
      Node(Point p)
      Constructs and initializes a node at the Point location.
      Node(Point p, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a node at the Point location with its ID.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNeighbor(int ID)
      Add ID of node to list of adjacency node which means that the node with that ID is adjacent to this node.
      int getID()
      Get the ID of this node.
      java.lang.Integer getIDNeighbor(int index)
      Get ID of neighbor node from list of neighbor node from certain index.
      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getListOfNeighbours()
      Get list of adjacency node correspond to this node.
      Point getLocation()
      Get location of node which return a point.
      int numberOfNeighbor()
      Returns number of neighbor node correspond to this node.
      void removeNeighbor(java.lang.Integer ID)
      Remove ID of node from list of adjacency node which means that node with that ID is not adjacent anymore to this node.
      void setID(int ID)
      Set the ID of this node
      void setIDNeighbor(int index, java.lang.Integer ID)
      Set ID of neighbor node from list of neighbor node on certain index.
      void setLocation(double x, double y)
      Set location of node to (x,y) location.
      void setLocation(Point p)
      Set location of node to point location.
